Text: Thanks for the screenshots.  They show this is not HD.  How can you keep your skull with all the spam and lies?

TS; Telesync means a copy which was shot in an empty cinema or from the projection booth with a professional camera, directly connected to the sound source. 

HDTS is a Telesync done with a High Definition camera.

That doesn't mean the movie will come out in high definition like a blue-ray, it's only a high quality cam.

UltraTorrents is not lying. tflagger997, you just didn't know the meaning of the term HDTS. It's easy to jump to conclusions thou when you see HD in the title.

TS; Telesync means a copy which was shot in an empty cinema or from the projection booth with a professional camera, directly connected to the sound source. 

HDTS; is a Telesync done with a High Definition camera.

 That doesn't mean you will get a blue-ray quality cam, it only means that it's a high quality cam. The green skull means the upload is from a highly trusted source.
